# GFM Features Test

This text has ~~strikethrough~~ in it.

## Footnotes

Here is a simple footnote[^1].

A footnote with multiple paragraphs[^2].

[^1]: This is the first footnote.

[^2]: Here's one with multiple paragraphs.

    Indent paragraphs to include them in the footnote.

## Inline HTML

<div align="center">
  <strong>Centered content</strong>
</div>

## Definition Lists (not GFM but common)

Term 1
: Definition 1

## Emoji (shortcodes not supported, use Unicode)

Native emoji: :rocket: vs Unicode rocket
